item.title: Pics after the Lockdown
item.description: The “Seamless Watch” watch has all the features that users expect in a digital watch, and some unusual features. The watch has the following features:

item.title: In The Garden
item.description: The user may cycle among all modes (date/time, timer, mystery answer) by pressing the mode button.
